resources.string: Wɔnhyɛɛ akwan a wɔfa so nya nneɛma ho adwuma no ase
Accessibility services no ayɛ adwuma nanso ɛnyɛ adwuma, wubetumi abɔ mmɔden sɛ wobɛsan ayɛ adwuma anaasɛ wobɛsan ahyɛ wo fon no ase
Entumi mmaa kwan a wɔfa so kɔ hɔ no nyɛ adwuma a ɛwɔ root hokwan ahorow
Hyehyɛ
Script no tu mmirika
Fa foreground service di dwuma na ama wo app no ​​akɔ so ayɛ adwuma
Nnwuma a Wɔde Kɔ Nneɛma Mu
Mfɛnsere a ɛsensɛn nsu so
Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔma accessibility service nnwuma no tumi yɛ adwuma (wɔakora so) .
Ɛsɛ sɛ wubue mfɛnsere a ɛsensɛn nsu so no na woahu log no (ade a wɔakora so) .
Volume up key no gyae script ahorow no nyinaa
Sɛ wobue wie a, sɛ wode script no tu mmirika a, ɛbɛma woabue accessibility service no ankasa a Root privileges (reserved item) .
Ma nnwuma a ɛwɔ root hokwan ahorow no nyɛ adwuma ankasa
Nhyehyɛe nhwehwɛmu no gyina hɔ pintinn kɛse bere a wɔahyɛ no den no, nanso ebia script dodow bi rentumi nyɛ adwuma yiye. San hyɛ accessibility service ase na ama ayɛ adwuma
Mode a ɛyɛ den
Nnwuma a Wɔde Kɔ Nneɛma Mu
Nkyerɛ interface titiriw no
Key_dont_nkyerɛ_dwumadi_titiriw
Fa script no di dwuma tẽẽ bere a woabue app no ​​awie no
Fa log no sie
Key_hide_nkyerɛwde ahorow
Log interface no nnyi adi, na script mmoa ho hia na ama woabue interface yi bere foforo
Foforɔ
\n ------------ \n [ %s ] Wowiee mmirikatu wɔ %f sekan mu
E-mail so
Paswɛde
Log-in anaa woakyerɛw wo din
Login mu
\"akwaaba!\"
Nyɛ edin a ɛfata a wɔde di dwuma
Ɛsɛ sɛ password no boro nkyerɛwde 5
\"Login no antumi anyɛ yiye\".

Ɛsɛ sɛ softwea no bue \"Accessibility Services\" na ama ayɛ adwuma, yɛsrɛ wo bue \"Settings->Accessibility Services\" anaa \"Settings->Accessibility Services->More Downloaded Services\", hwehwɛ \" %s \", na ma Accessibility Services nyɛ adwuma
Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔma akwan a wɔfa so nya nneɛma no yɛ adwuma
Amanneɛbɔ bar no bɛkyerɛ \"App yi reyɛ adwuma\" amanneɛbɔ no bere nyinaa na ama dwumadi no akɔ so ayɛ adwuma
